Noun: method or manner of conduct in relation to others
the act of transacting within or between groups (as carrying on commercial activitie)
Verb: act on verbally or in some form of artistic expression
take into consideration for exemplifying purposes
take action with respect to (someone or somethin)
succeed in doing, achieving, or producing (somethin)
administer or bestow, as in small portions
do business; offer for sale as for one's livelihood
be in charge of, act on, or dispose of
behave in a certain way towards others
distribute cards to the players in a game
direct the course of; manage or control
give out as one's portion or share
